projects.title: Agriculture in Bangladesh Website UI Design
projects.description: Agriculture in Bangladesh Website UI Design
projects.longDescription: Modern agriculture information website UI featuring a clean green-themed layout, categorized sections for major crops (rice, wheat, maize), livestock highlights, and data-driven infographics designed to showcase Bangladesh's agrarian economy and food security progress

projects.title: Hossain's Restaurant – Bangladeshi Style Dining Website UI Design
projects.description: Hossain's Restaurant – Bangladeshi Style Dining Website UI Design
projects.longDescription: Modern restaurant landing page UI featuring a vibrant Bangladeshi Style hero section with 20% discount offers, a categorized menu of popular items, integrated online table booking, and customer testimonials designed for authentic culinary businesses

projects.title: Clinika – Medical Clinic & Blood Donation Website UI Design
projects.description: Clinika – Medical Clinic & Blood Donation Website UI Design
projects.longDescription: Modern medical clinic and blood donation platform UI featuring a streamlined Find a Doctor booking system, detailed blood donation process guides, a searchable donor network, and real-time blood bank availability designed for healthcare providers and emergency services

projects.title: Robert Garcia – Front-End Developer Portfolio Website UI Design
projects.description: Robert Garcia – Front-End Developer Portfolio Website UI Design
projects.longDescription: Modern and minimalist dark-themed portfolio UI for a Sydney-based front-end developer featuring a bold hero section, detailed project cards for Adventure Time and World News, a specialized 'About Me' section highlighting a mechanical engineering background, and a clean contact form designed for professional creative networking

projects.title: Ultimate Anime Mashup Streetwear Hoodie – Premium Aesthetic Graphic Pullover
